00023 #define FichierHDF_included

00025 #include <Process.h>

00027 #include <Sortie_Brute.h>

00029 #include <Noms.h>

00033 #ifdef MED_H
00034 #ifndef MED_
00035 #define MED_

00046 //
00047 // 
00048 // 
00049 // 
00050 //
00051 //
00052 //
00053 //
00054 //! This abstract class provides all the functionalities to open and manipulate HDF files and related<br>concepts (datasets, groups, etc ...)<br>It intentionally does not place itself in the Sortie_Fichier_base or Entree_Fichier_base hierarchy<br>since it is rather the datasets inside the HDF file that are regarded as TRUST Fichier objects.
00055 //
00056 class FichierHDF
00057 {
00058 public:
00059   FichierHDF();
00060   virtual ~FichierHDF();
00061 
00062 // Creates (and open) the HDF file.
00063   virtual void create(Nom filename);
00064   virtual void open(Nom filename, bool readOnly);
00065   virtual void close();
00066 
00067 // Multiple Writer methods:
00068 // every processor writes their own dataset into the file
00069   virtual void create_and_fill_dataset_MW(Nom dataset_basename, Sortie_Brute& sortie);
00070   virtual void create_and_fill_dataset_MW(Nom dataset_basename, SChaine& sortie);
00071 
00072 // Method to write the dataset owned by proc #proc_rank in the given file
00073 // (to use when a single proc writes all the datasets for example)
00074   virtual void create_and_fill_dataset_SW(Nom datasetname, Sortie_Brute& sortie);
00075 
00076 // Method to read the dataset owned by proc #proc_rank in the given file
00077   virtual void read_dataset(Nom dataset_basename, int proc_rank, Entree_Brute& entree);
00078 
00079 // Method to create datasets of size length and whose names are given by dataset_names
00080 // to use when a process has multiple datasets to write
00081 #ifdef MED_
00082   void create_datasets(Noms dataset_names, hsize_t length);
00083 #endif
00084 // Method to write sortie into the specified dataset
00085   void fill_dataset(Nom dataset_name, Sortie_Brute& sortie);
00086 
00087 // checks if a dataset named dataset_name exists in the file
00088   virtual bool exists(const char* dataset_name);
00089 // check if the file file_name is in the HDF5 format
00090   static bool is_hdf5(const char *file_name);
00091 
00092 protected:
00093   virtual void prepare_file_props();
00094   virtual void prepare_dataset_props();
00095 #ifdef MED_
00096   void create_and_fill_dataset_MW(Nom dataset_basename, const char* data, hsize_t lenData, hid_t datatype);
00097 
00098   hid_t file_id_;
00099   hid_t file_access_plst_;
00100   hid_t dataset_transfer_plst_;
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 private:
00104 // Forbid copy:
00105   FichierHDF& operator=(const FichierHDF&);
00106   FichierHDF(const FichierHDF&);
00107 
00108 };
00109 #endif
